welcomePage.title: Welcome
welcomePage.text: We're happy to have you! You now have the power to shape Canada's broadcasting industry! By taking part in our surveys, you help broadcasters understand the kind of entertainment Canadians care about. Be assured that your data and privacy are always protected. We hope you enjoy time with us.
